content: for bor onto 4 dpns use locking marker for bor round 7 knit all stitches round 7 knit all stitches round 8 *kfb k1* to the end 18 round 8 *kfb k1* to the end 24 round 9 *kfb k2* to the end 24 round 9 *kfb k2* to the end 32 round 10 *kfb k3* to the end 30 round 10 *kfb k3* to the end 40 round 11 *kfb k4* to the end 36 round 11 *kfb k4* 48 rounds 12- 21 knit all stitches round 12-23 knit all stitches you can knit additional rounds here to make a you can knit additional rounds here to make a taller pumpkin before beginning the decreases taller pumpkin before beginning the decreases as desired as desired round 22 *k2tog k2* to the end 27 round 24 *k2tog k2* to the end 36 round 23 *k2tog k1* to the end 18 round 25 *k2tog k1* to the end 24 round 24 *k2tog* to the end 9 round 26 *k2tog* to the end 12 stuff the pumpkin at this point stuff the pumpkin at this point round 25 *k2tog* to the last st k1 5 round 27 *k2tog* to the las st 6 break yarn leaving a +30 long tail using a break yarn leaving a +30 long tail using a darning needle cinch the remaining stitches darning needle cinch the remaining stitches together together make ridges by inserting darning needle with make ridges by inserting darning needle with tail through the center bottom and out the top tail through the center bottom and out the top where the colour changes loop around outside where the colour changes loop around outside of pumpkin and insert into the bottom coming of pumpkin and insert into the bottom coming out the top a little to the left pull until there is out the top a little to the left pull until there is a desired indent repeat until there are 6 a desired indent repeat until there are 6-8 indents indents
